TextView.android:text: Procurement Services (Bidding for Goods and Services)
This service caters the entire procurement process from the determination of the method of procurement to be used for the procurement of goods and services up to payment of such.
1. Approved Purchase request with complete attachment \n2. Documents stipulated in the Instruction to bidders
1. Request for BAC Recommendation on the proposed procurement.
1.4. Advertise and/or post the invitation to bid through Philgeps and to three conspicuous places in the Municipality
1.5. Conduct pre-procurement conference for contracts to be bid with an ABC for Two Million Pesos (₱2,000,000.00) and above.
1.6. Conduct pre-bid conference for contracts to be bid with an ABC of One Million Pesos (₱1,000,000.00) or more.
2.3. Conduct the evaluation of bids and determination of the Lowest calculated bid/ Single Calculated bid.
3.1. Approval of Resolution/ Issuance of Notice of Award
4.1. Execution of Contract and signing by the HOPE
6. Accomplished the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS) form and drop it in the feedback box
6.1. Gives CSS form for service feedback. Instruct the client to place the accomplished CSS form in the feedback drop box
